title: Pixel 5 that set up 3 email accts (gmail, and 2 POP accts) Cannot locate POP accounts???
content: I have set up 3 email accounts on my new phone; Gmail and two POP accounts.   When I go to email in settings it shows all 3 accounts but I cannot for the life of me locate the POP accounts to open them.  The Gmail account is available in apps but I cannot find the others anywhere!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
